name: KidsBooksoftheBible
0:
”Alexa open kids bible books”
”Alexa start kids bible books and tell me a book”
”Alexa launch kids bible books and tell me a book”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kids bible books
des:
A Holy Bible based skill to teach kids the names, order and other features of the Books of the Holy Bible.
This skill will help kids learn like never before and will amaze you with the results. Learning all the names of the books of The Holy Bible, their order,etc is something that even adults struggle with till date. This skill can help you learn all those things and overcome the confusion that other methods cause. Uisng this skill kids and any one who wants to learn including adults who are kids at heart can learn about the books of The Holy Bible and amaze people all around.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
